page.title: About Us - AngoraSix
page.description: Learn about AngoraSix's story, vision and values. A cooperative platform for creating and managing projects in a decentralized way.

hero.title: Redefining Collaboration
hero.subtitle: A platform where we are all owners, where transparency guides our decisions and where every project has the potential to change the world.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: AngoraSix was born from the frustration of seeing great ideas fall by the wayside due to lack of structure, inadequate tools and unfair distribution of generated value.
story.paragraph2: We believe there is a better way to create solutions: cooperatively, transparently and decentralized, where every person who contributes is valued fairly.
story.birth: This is how AngoraSix was born

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Redefine the way we create solutions, promoting comprehensive development both personal and social.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: We present to the world an alternative management model to the traditional one, which allows creating and carrying out great ideas in a cooperative and decentralized way, enhancing human value and encouraging people to develop more deeply.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make

transparency.title: Trust and Transparency
transparency.description: To grow, trust is necessary - in the platform, in people, in projects. Transparency is the foundation of every solid relationship.

purpose.title: Meaning and Purpose
purpose.description: We want to allow people to dedicate their time and effort to something that is worthwhile for them. Every project must have a clear purpose.

community.title: Community
community.description: Being part of something, with a common goal, worked cooperatively and healthily, connecting in a more natural way.

evolution.title: Evolution and Originality
evolution.description: A different paradigm, an new path. Progress and growth, but not through the path associated with traditional 'progress'.

trust.title: Invitation to Create
trust.description: We want to inspire, motivate to undertake, innovate or move by ideals, dreams and principles. Look at the sky, not the ground.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Return to simpler values of relating to each other. Change unbridled material ambition for a sense of appreciation and peace.

community.title: Our Community
community.subtitle: Some of the members who are part of AngoraSix
community.philosophy: At AngoraSix there are no founders or employees. We are all owners and contribute according to our abilities and passions.
